bundle.name: frontend

description.p: The frontend bundle installs Apache2 and snap.cgi which together handle client requests and determine whether to proxy the request to a snapserver.
It is expected to be installed only on frontend computers.
You should not install this bundle on any of your backend computer. If you want to run snapmanager.cgi on a backend, it will not involve snap.cgi at all.

bundle.postinst: # The snap-httpoxy is part of snapbase, but if apache2 was not yet # installed when snapbase got installed, then this command did not # run, so run it now to make sure it is effective # a2enconf snap-httpoxy
